index.head: CHANGING THE BASE
index.screenText:
We may not be interested only in doubling. Perhaps we may want to know the time when the amount (or the number) of the bacteria increases, or even decreases by a certain fraction every unit time. All these cases can be analysed by using the general equation as shown below:
y = N0ax
Here a > 1 describes increase, and 0 < a < 1 describes decrease as time goes; and the value of 'a' is the factor by which N0 increases or decreases per unit time.
